entry.title: Downtime
entry.content:
In the period between exams, @ElliotJH and I decided to have a go at making a meal for some of my housemates.

Pork carnitas…ish

  • Pork shoulder
  • Paprika
  • Cumin
  • Dried coriander
  • Dried chillis
  • Black pepper
  • Salt
  • Slow-cooked for 6-8 hours in water and the seasonings
  • Shredded, then grilled until crisp

Chicken fajitas…ish

  • Chicken breast
  • Paprika
  • Cumin
  • Dried coriander
  • Green chillis
  • Multicoloured peppers
  • Sliced and fried until cooked through

Salsa

  • Tomatoes
  • Fresh coriander
  • Red onion
  • Red chillis
  • Lime juice
  • One bowl made with chilli, one without, one blended until smoother

Guacamole

  • Avocados
  • Lime juice
  • Salt
  • Black pepper

Tortillas

  • Plain flour
  • Salt
  • Baking powder
  • Boiling water
  • Made using this recipe, fried in a cast iron skillet

Cheese

  • Cheddar cheese
  • Elliot’s food processor
  • Elliot’s overenthusiasm to use said food processor

Overall, a fun day of cooking, and hopefully a nice meal for @danpalmer, @charliedjpacey, @swabl and @Kanpai888.

entry.title: Exciting first post
entry.content:
This is my extremely exciting first blog post (using Jekyll).

I set up Jekyll using the tutorial by Matthew Manning. My custom buildpack for more recent versions of Jekyll is available on GitHub.
